i.Game SiChuan Mahjong

The easy version of Mahjong Solitaire! Match pairs that can be connected by a line within two turns and remove all tiles to clear each unique stage. Play a casual game of challenge the timed mode game, but beware: tiles will be moving and stones will appear on later stages, just to ensure a really exciting game! Be careful to use the 9 magic objects, which can remove any tile, exchange position for two tiles, redeal all tiles, add time, eliminate stones, give you hints.....It's highly recommended that you leave magic objects for the last level (Emerald Level) because you will surely need them!

Exclusively designed for iPhone, you can pinch your fingers together or apart to zoom in or out any game area. If you need to redeal tiles, just shake your phone!

English and Chinese versions with detailed game help provided.


i.Game晶鑽四川麻將

最傳統好玩的麻將配對連連看遊戲,在iPhone亮麗登場!只要在兩折之內連線的牌,即可消除,將牌面清空即可過關!珍珠、水晶、紅寶石、翡翠四大關卡,牌面會隨消牌移動,還得小心繞過不時長出的大石頭,一關比一關還艱難!遊戲中包含時間與休閒兩種不同模式,玩家可隨意任選一種挑戰,並特別設計九種魔法道具,可任意消牌、交換兩張牌的位置、延長時間、消滅石頭....等等,幫助你度過重重難關。

iPhone的四川麻將可任意放大縮小牌面,並移動牌面,方便消牌,任何時間只要搖晃手機,即可啟動金手指魔法,將牌重新排列。本遊戲支援中英文版本。
